yaml.subtitle: Interests and publications
yaml.description-meta: What I am interested in and what I have published so far

markdown.markdown:
* Ordinary and partial differential equations and their dynamics * Dynamical Systems and Ergodic Theory * Kinetic Theory and Entropy methods * Boltzmann equation and its BGK-type approximations * Long-time behavior of solutions (Hypocoercivity) * Models of chemical reactions * Physical applications ## Publications ### In progress - *Discrete hypocoercivity for a nonlinear kinetic reaction model without initial close-to-equilibrium assumption.* (working title)
joint work with [L. Liu](https://www.math.cuhk.edu.hk/~lliu/) and [M. Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml) ### Refereed journal articles * A. Pauthier, J.D.M. Rademacher, D. Ulbrich.
*Weak and strong interaction of excitation kinks in scalar parabolic equations.*
J Dyn Diff Equat. Published 30 July 2021; Volume 35, pages 2199-2235, (2023) [[DOI]](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10884-021-10040-2) [[arXiv]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.00309) * M. Keßeböhmer, J.D.M. Rademacher, D. Ulbrich.
*Dynamics and topological entropy of 1D Greenberg-Hastings cellular automata.*
Ergodic Theory and Dynamical Systems. 2021;41(5):1397-1430 [[DOI]](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/ergodic-theory-and-dynamical-systems/article/dynamics-and-topological-entropy-of-1d-greenberghastings-cellular-automata/1DBE1EC4EC7BE9F216E9E35C214F2F3C) [[arXiv]](https://arxiv.org/abs/1903.02459) ### Theses * D. Ulbrich.
*Ergodic theory of nonlinear waves in discrete and continuous excitable media.*
Dissertation, 2021 [[DOI]](https://media.suub.uni-bremen.de/handle/elib/5257)

## Research interests * Ordinary and partial differential equations and their dynamics * Dynamical Systems and Ergodic Theory * Kinetic Theory and Entropy methods * Boltzmann equation and its BGK-type approximations * Long-time behavior of solutions (Hypocoercivity) * Models of chemical reactions * Physical applications ## Publications ### In progress - *Discrete hypocoercivity for a nonlinear kinetic reaction model without initial close-to-equilibrium assumption.* (working title)
joint work with [L. Liu](https://www.math.cuhk.edu.hk/~lliu/) and [M. Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml) ### Refereed journal articles * A. Pauthier, J.D.M. Rademacher, D. Ulbrich.
*Weak and strong interaction of excitation kinks in scalar parabolic equations.*
J Dyn Diff Equat. Published 30 July 2021; Volume 35, pages 2199-2235, (2023) [[DOI]](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10884-021-10040-2) [[arXiv]](https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.00309) * M. Keßeböhmer, J.D.M. Rademacher, D. Ulbrich.
*Dynamics and topological entropy of 1D Greenberg-Hastings cellular automata.*
Ergodic Theory and Dynamical Systems. 2021;41(5):1397-1430 [[DOI]](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/ergodic-theory-and-dynamical-systems/article/dynamics-and-topological-entropy-of-1d-greenberghastings-cellular-automata/1DBE1EC4EC7BE9F216E9E35C214F2F3C) [[arXiv]](https://arxiv.org/abs/1903.02459) ### Theses * D.
